attributes.action: Publicise FREECYCLE, the internet based service that lists items offered for free which otherwise would have gone to landfill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most towns have a FREECYCLE list with a hundred items offered daily. Use email to arrange collection of the item.

Offer your own junk and see who wants it. It has to be free. It's all about keeping stuff out of landfill.

Do a google search for "freecycle" to find your local group. This needs promoting in local council literature and at waste transfer depots.
